channel.title: DJ IHaveAHat

channel.itunes:summary: Bringing you DJ sets across the entire spectrum of EDM

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (18#01)
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Look who’s still alive (spoiler: it’s me). Felt the urge to mix something again, so here it is! ]]>

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (17#52)
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Ending the year with some wonderful euphoric hardstyle vibes, focusing on my favourites, but with some new sounds as well, happy new year! ]]>

item.title: A Bit Of Everything Mix (17#37)
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Why have one genre when you can have ALL the genres, and that’s exactly what we have this week! A journey from slow to fast through various styles of dance music. ]]>

<![CDATA[

item.title: Da Tweekaz Showcase Mix (17#30)
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Known by pretty much everyone already, this week’s set showcases some of the best of Da Tweekaz, but mostly it was just a good excuse to play a lot of their tracks. ]]>

item.title: House & Subground Mix (17#29)
item.description:
<![CDATA[

item.description:

item.title: Frenchcore Mix (17#14)
item.description:
<![CDATA[
And now for something completely different, our first ever frenchcore mix, coming in at a whopping 200BPM we have a set filled with remixed pop classics and more! ]]>

item.description:
<![CDATA[

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#12)
item.description:

item.title: Trance Mix (17#07)

item.title: Oldskool Nustyle Mix (17#06)
item.description:
<![CDATA[
The ubiqitous pitch-shifting kicks we hear nowadays, used to be known as nustyle kicks, this mix features a selection of songs from the earlier days of this sound ]]>

item.description:

item.title: S3RL Showcase Mix (2016-11-08)
item.description:
<![CDATA[
This week we’re showcasing the amazing, cheesy DJ S3RL, hell, there isn’t a single track of his I dislike. Regardless, if you enjoy any of his tracks, you can buy em and support the scene: https://www.beatport.com/artist/s3rl/136015/tracks ]]>
